Blog.post: Yoz. . my first blog. . .enjoy. .

Back from astro. . .wee. . .simply love the club. . .lolx. . .the people there machiam chaos reincarnated. . .lolx. . .aniway wanna learn astro-photography. . .which is taking photos of astro objects. . .interesting isn't it? As usual. . .went Clementi after astro. . .wanted to buy the plush dog soft toy from Mac. . . it's sold out. . .ZzZ. . .gonna try my luck at AMK outlets. . . Later still gotta work @ 12. . .sigh. . .

Bloody hell. . .reported for work late. . .but that's insignificant. . .screw the coupons issued by NKF. . .90% of the guests were students which used the 3+1 student coupon. . .Crowd keep on entering and Mark was there along with his friends. .ZzZ. . 2 Deyi groups came as well. . .lucky not those 4 and Jo. . .*phew. .lolx. . . Now ready to head to SP agian for astro. . then watch River Plate VS Arsenal @ 1am. . .Wee. . . But then now high fatigue levels. . TIRED! ! !

One of the reasons I going for school is that I have a group of friends that are walking WMDs. The jokes they said . .oh man. . sooner or later gonna have stomach cramps from laughing too much. . .lolx. . .long live "Anithing but B***y" group! ! ! When I received my only call so far todae. . I was surprised at the caller's name. . .well thought that I was 'stealth' all along. . wondered what made her called. . but anyway. . .wanna help to her prob of a guy pestering her ever since mon? Well. . let's on decide on that. . see how the days goes by. . .
Now at school com lab. . .doing some idiotic maths qns. . .see the qns. . i wanna sae: 'Fucking shit! ! !' Wonder how to get pass the remaining time left. . .ZzZ. . .

Today went sch for just 2hr of lessons before off. . .stupid C prog. . .boring crap. . lucky its com lesson, after done assignment. . .went surfing on the web. . . Damning hell. . my ankle still hurts. . .cant wait to get back in action. . . Still cant concentrate to get started with revison. . .why? ? ? ZzZ. . .

Its now 2234 according to my lappy time. . .now dunno wad to do. . .bored. . .no one to sms now. . sigh. . .wanted to start revising. . .but then with all these thoughts in my head. . .cant seem able to concentrate. . .today's lessons. . .again I was building castles in the air. . .I suppose time to build new objects in the air, sick and tired of castles. . .sigh. . .now thinking wad to do. . .

Tired, tired tired. . .back from football. . .aww. . .my ankle. . .X_X 5 games played and only a hattrick in the last game before limping off?! Oh man. .where's my usual goal touch? Sigh. . . Lesson time in SP. . .well I was simply building castle in the air and practiced some basic Korean vowels. . Surprise. . .met up Huey Chien at bustop. . .spent the whole trip to SP catching up with each other. . .wonder will I be lucky again soon to be chatting with her while on the bus. . .now rushing showers. . .BRB!
Tired man. . .but now it's already 2341 on Sunday night, I cant sleep! Been thinking too much about somethings. . .sigh. . .one thing. . am I too dumb to detect hints?
Wee. . .finally the foundations got setup. ..thx Jo for ya help. . .nw. . .find out wad skins can be added on. . .
testing. .

Another astro session passed. . .finally an obbing session after 2 weeks of 'theory' sessions. But then the skies aren't as good as Wed's. . .ZzZ. . .My lappy's wireless needs to be config by the sch's tech. . .basket. . . Saturday. . .gonna spend 7 hours at work. . .cant wait for Sunday. . .at least viewing fireworks after knocking off. . . --~^kEnBoA^~
Muahahaha. . .my blog looks more better now. . .lolx. . .5 gifs, and 2 pix up there. . .wee. . thanks to Jo for her help. . . Waiting for night to come. . .astro time! ! ! --~^kEnBoA^~

Woke up at 0600, which is only 5 hours after I fell asleep. . .lucky its a 0830 class, took my time to prepare. . .maths quiz so easy. . .finshed that with 300s. . .then lecutre as usual, went dreaming. . . After school, went back to AMK, reached 438 bb court, basket man, those 2 'IMH patients' apparently 'escaped' saw me and call me 'idiot' which I replied 'Idiot call who?' She replied 'You la!' Lolx. . .haha fell for the old trick again. . .she bothering me for drinks which I reluctantly bought. . .so troublesome they are! ! ! Night skies getting better day by day. . .but it doesn't matter now. . .It only matters WHEN THE PERSIDS meteors showers are here! ! ! Gotta ZzZ. . .Long day ahead. . . --~^kEnBoA^~

Wee. . .hahaha. . .today is very enjoyable despite a lousy start. Class of by 1230, then Jeff and 'Ayala' were in camous already. . .so by 1300, we were already playing. . .first few games sux. . .chances are rare and me no passes to chase. . .ZzZ. . .anyway. . .got a good haul of goals. . .at least 10. . .but one thing, all scored with my lefty. . .my righty totally screwed up the shots. . .ZzZ. . . After football, showered in campus and went to clubhouse. Good news: Observation session! ! !Haha. . .From 2200 to 2200++, spent in the basketball court doing observation. . .wee. . .freaking clear skies! ! ! Seen Jupiter, Scorpius and many more plus star clusters through the scopes. . . But now tired. . .woke up early, played football plus obbing. . .now totally drained out. . .tomorrow got class @ 0830. . .time to finish blog and ZzZ. . .anyway. . .enjoyed today. . . --~^kEnBoA^~

What a perfect start I had for this morning, woke up 8min past 0600, which is a BAD timing for me. Spent 7 min just to wash up and brush my teeth! ! ARH! ! Then I realised that I need to pack some things as I gonna play football in campus later on. . .Chiong all the way during preparations. . .by 0700 reached busstop to meet my friend. Bloody hell, 3 buses came and all were packed like sardine cans. . .then I thought, gonna be very late . . .ZzZ. . .but, lucky that the bus chiong. . .only late by 5min. . . Now at com lab. . .doing C Prog. . .ZzZ. . .freezing here. . .and sleepy. . .yawned a few times already. . .then later got 4hr got CRS or in simple terms, English to go. . .boring crap. . . --~^kEnBoA^~

Its's already approaching midnight. . .yet I'm still behind my lappy. . .seems that late night got onto me. . . Been through 4 hours of chats on msn? And now still chatting. . wonder how I get sleep. . . --~^kEnBoA^~

Woke up early today to study for my test. .but nothing went inside my troubled-mind. . .went to expand mu mp3 collection instead. . . During lectures, as usual. . .this time built Strike Eagles, my favourite fighter. . .that's how wild my mind can go. . .and test was even worse. . .my mind went blank the moment I saw the questions. . .lucky lecturer allowed usage of discman. . .or else I would have suffered even worse. . . At least told someone why I'm not alright. . .erm. . .sigh. . .used to think that I'm immune to these problems. . .well. . .look at me now. . . --~^kEnBoA^~
